prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that glows in the dark and has a mischievous personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can phase through walls and has a playful demeanor.
Show me a haunting Pokemon with spectral features and a spooky presence.
Design a ghostly creature that floats and has eerie, glowing eyes.
Make a Pokemon that can move silently and has a chilling aura.
Generate a mysterious Pokemon with an ethereal shape and a knack for tricks.
Give me an image of a shadowy Pokemon that blends into the night.
